name: Soul Ma(gne)tes
description:
A tale of mutual attraction~

A short game about people of the more... metallic persuasion finding their soul ma(gne)tes in a world where they are inevitably attracted to each other.

The evil level designer has separated them, but the power of their love is unstoppable and they will be reunited before long.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Controls: 

Go left/right:  A/D  or ←/→

Jump: Space or W or ↑

Switch: Ctrl or S or ↓

A game by:

Game Design: [Tyr|x]

Programming: Haru

Programming & Art: teh_nicKLess

Sound Effects & Music: Arnus_barnus

UI Icons: https://delapouite.com/

Font: www.fontspace.com/ultra-cool-fonts

Thank you so much for playing!
